name: Ability Focus

sections.body: Choose one of the creature's special attacks. Add +2 to the DC for all saving throws against the special attack on which the creature focuses.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: A creature can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time the creature takes the feat, it applies to a different special attack.
sections.name: Special

description: One of this creature's special attacks is particularly difficult to resist.
